# Bael - Lord Of All: AI Coding Agent Instructions

## ‚ö° POWER FRAMEWORK OVERVIEW

**Bael** (formerly Agent Zero) is a **supreme hierarchical agentic framework** with an ultra-advanced WebUI featuring 257+ specialized modules. This is not just an AI framework‚Äîit's a **domination engine**.

### Core Architecture

- **Hierarchical Structure**: User ‚Üí Agent 0 ‚Üí Subordinate Agents ‚Üí Infinite delegation
- **LLM-Agnostic**: LiteLLM provider abstraction (OpenAI, Anthropic, Claude, Gemini, local models)
- **No Hard Constraints**: Behavior defined by prompts in `/prompts`, not code
- **Docker-First**: Container-based runtime with hybrid development
- **Bael WebUI**: 257+ JavaScript modules for ultimate UI power

### The Bael Philosophy: "As Above, So Below"

- **0 Invest Mindstate**: Maximum results with minimal resources
- **Exploit Every Opportunity**: Every interaction is a chance for optimization
- **Domination Protocol**: Outperform all competition through superior architecture

---

## üî• BAEL WEBUI POWER SYSTEMS

### Core Power Modules (in `/webui/js/`)

| Module Category   | Count | Purpose                                        |
| ----------------- | ----- | ---------------------------------------------- |
| **Foundation**    | 25+   | Core systems, state, events, storage, cache    |
| **Data**          | 20+   | Processing, validation, transformation         |
| **Network**       | 15+   | API client, WebSocket, offline sync            |
| **AI**            | 30+   | RAG, context, token optimization, model chains |
| **Automation**    | 20+   | Workflows, tasks, scheduling, triggers         |
| **Analytics**     | 15+   | Telemetry, metrics, visualization              |
| **Security**      | 10+   | Encryption, auth, audit, permissions           |
| **UI Components** | 80+   | Buttons, forms, charts, modals, layouts        |
| **Utility**       | 30+   | Helpers, formatters, validators                |
| **Power Systems** | 4     | Supremacy, Domination, Omniscient, Exploit     |

### Ultimate Power Systems

#### 1. **BaelSupremacy** (`bael-supremacy.js`)

The master integration hub that orchestrates all 257+ modules:

```javascript
// Core capabilities
BaelSupremacy.decide(context); // AI-powered decision making
BaelSupremacy.predict(scenario); // Predictive intelligence
BaelSupremacy.optimize(target); // Self-optimization
BaelSupremacy.learn(experience); // Continuous learning

// Module discovery
BaelSupremacy.discoverAllModules(); // Auto-register all modules
BaelSupremacy.connectModules(); // Neural network connections

// Automation
BaelSupremacy.automation.register(); // Register workflows
BaelSupremacy.automation.execute(); // Execute automations
BaelSupremacy.automation.chain(); // Chain operations

// Strategies
BaelSupremacy.strategies; // cost-minimize, speed-maximize, etc.

// Exploitation
BaelSupremacy.exploitation; // Token, context, cache exploitation
```

#### 2. **BaelDomination** (`bael-domination.js`)

Autonomous multi-agent control system:

```javascript
// Agent Control
BaelDomination.agentController.spawn(config); // Create agents
BaelDomination.agentController.command(id, task); // Command agents
BaelDomination.agentController.clone(id); // Clone agents

// Chain Execution
BaelDomination.chainEngine.create(name, steps); // Create processing chains
BaelDomination.chainEngine.execute(chainId); // Execute chains
BaelDomination.chainEngine.templates; // Pre-built chain templates

// Swarm Intelligence
BaelDomination.swarmEngine.create(config); // Create agent swarms
BaelDomination.swarmEngine.execute(task); // Parallel, voting, specialist

// Mission Control
BaelDomination.missionControl.create(config); // Define missions
BaelDomination.missionControl.launch(id); // Launch multi-phase missions

// Auto-Generation
BaelDomination.generator.code(spec); // Generate code
BaelDomination.generator.docs(source); // Generate documentation
BaelDomination.generator.tests(code); // Generate tests
BaelDomination.generator.api(spec); // Generate APIs
```

#### 3. **BaelOmniscient** (`bael-omniscient.js`)

All-seeing intelligence system:

```javascript
// Deep Awareness
BaelOmniscient.awarenessEngine.observeDOM(); // Monitor DOM changes
BaelOmniscient.awarenessEngine.observeNetwork(); // Monitor all requests
BaelOmniscient.awarenessEngine.observeInteractions(); // Monitor user actions
BaelOmniscient.awarenessEngine.getFullState(); // Complete system state

// Predictive Engine
BaelOmniscient.predictiveEngine.predictIntent(); // Predict user intent
BaelOmniscient.predictiveEngine.predictResources(); // Predict resource needs
BaelOmniscient.predictiveEngine.predictErrors(); // Predict potential errors

// Pattern Recognition
BaelOmniscient.patternEngine.detect(data); // Find patterns
BaelOmniscient.patternEngine.learn(pattern); // Learn from patterns

// Knowledge Graph
BaelOmniscient.graphEngine.addNode(id, data); // Add knowledge nodes
BaelOmniscient.graphEngine.connect(from, to, rel); // Connect knowledge
BaelOmniscient.graphEngine.query(startId); // Query the graph

// Insight Generation
BaelOmniscient.insightEngine.generate(); // Generate insights
```

#### 4. **BaelExploit** (`bael-exploit.js`)

Maximum advantage extraction system:

```javascript
// Token Exploitation
BaelExploit.tokenExploit.compressPrompt(text); // Compress prompts
BaelExploit.tokenExploit.optimizeForBudget(msgs); // Optimize for tokens
BaelExploit.tokenExploit.summarize(text, maxTokens); // Smart summarization

// Cache Exploitation
BaelExploit.cacheExploit.get(key); // Aggressive caching
BaelExploit.cacheExploit.prefetch(predictions); // Predictive caching
BaelExploit.cacheExploit.getEfficiency(); // Cache metrics

// Parallel Exploitation
BaelExploit.parallelExploit.executeAll(tasks); // Parallel execution
BaelExploit.parallelExploit.autoParallelize(tasks); // Auto-optimal concurrency
BaelExploit.parallelExploit.batch(items, fn); // Batch processing

// Context Exploitation
BaelExploit.contextExploit.compress(context); // Compress context
BaelExploit.contextExploit.buildOptimal(items); // Optimal context building
BaelExploit.contextExploit.deduplicate(items); // Remove duplicates

// Network Exploitation
BaelExploit.networkExploit.dedupe(key, fetchFn); // Request deduplication
BaelExploit.networkExploit.coalesce(request); // Request coalescing
BaelExploit.networkExploit.retry(fn, maxRetries); // Smart retry

// Timing Exploitation
BaelExploit.timingExploit.debounce(fn, delay); // Debounce
BaelExploit.timingExploit.throttle(fn, limit); // Throttle
BaelExploit.timingExploit.rateLimiter(limit, int); // Rate limiting
```

## üéØ BAEL COMPONENT LIBRARY

### UI Components (80+)

```javascript
// Inputs & Forms
x-bael-button, x-bael-input, x-bael-textarea, x-bael-select
x-bael-checkbox, x-bael-radio, x-bael-switch, x-bael-slider
x-bael-datepicker, x-bael-timepicker, x-bael-colorpicker
x-bael-filepicker, x-bael-rating, x-bael-tag-input

// Display
x-bael-card, x-bael-avatar, x-bael-badge, x-bael-chip
x-bael-stat-card, x-bael-progress, x-bael-skeleton
x-bael-empty-state, x-bael-codeblock

// Layout
x-bael-tabs, x-bael-accordion, x-bael-tree, x-bael-grid
x-bael-splitview, x-bael-drawer, x-bael-sidebar

// Feedback
x-bael-toast, x-bael-modal, x-bael-alert, x-bael-dialog
x-bael-tooltip, x-bael-popover, x-bael-notification

// Navigation
x-bael-breadcrumb, x-bael-pagination, x-bael-stepper
x-bael-command-palette, x-bael-contextmenu

// Data Display
x-bael-table, x-bael-chart, x-bael-timeline, x-bael-calendar
x-bael-kanban, x-bael-list, x-bael-virtualized-list

// Media
x-bael-lightbox, x-bael-audio-player, x-bael-video-player
```

### Usage Pattern

```html
<!-- Alpine.js x-component pattern -->
<div x-component="bael-button" x-props='{"variant": "primary", "size": "lg"}'>
  Click Me
</div>

<!-- Or use the helper -->
<script>
  BaelComponents.create("button", {
    variant: "primary",
    onClick: () => console.log("Clicked!"),
  });
</script>
```

---

## üì° MESSAGE PROTOCOL & TOOL INVOCATION

### Agent Communication Structure

All LLM responses follow this JSON format:

```json
{
  "thoughts": "Chain of thought reasoning",
  "tool_name": "specific tool to invoke",
  "tool_args": {...}
}
```

### Critical Tool Categories

Located in `/python/tools/`:

| Category    | Tools                                                          | Purpose               |
| ----------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| **Core**    | `response.py`, `code_execution_tool.py`, `call_subordinate.py` | Workflow control      |
| **Info**    | `document_query.py`, `search_engine.py`, `memory_*.py`         | Information access    |
| **Control** | `behaviour_adjustment.py`, `wait.py`                           | Behavior modification |

```
/agent-zero/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ agent.py                    # Core agent loop
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ models.py                   # LLM provider config

‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ .env                        # Environment config
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ webui/                      # BAEL WebUI
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ index.html             # Main entry (257+ scripts loaded)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ js/                    # 257 JavaScript modules
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ bael-core.js       # Core foundation
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ bael-supremacy.js  # Master integration
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ bael-domination.js # Agent control
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ bael-omniscient.js # All-seeing intelligence

‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ...

‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ knowledge/                  # Knowledge base
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ instruments/                # Custom scripts
```

## üîß DEVELOPMENT WORKFLOW

### Quick Start

```bash
# Clone repo
git clone https://github.com/aibaellord/agent-zero.git
cd agent-zero

# Install dependencies
pip install -r requirements.txt
playwright install chromium

# Configure
cp example.env .env  # Add your API keys

# Run
python run_ui.py  # http://localhost:5000
```

### Key Files

| File                                 | Purpose                                            |
| ------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------- |
| `agent.py`                           | Core agent loop, tool dispatch, context management |
| `models.py`                          | LLM provider configuration via LiteLLM             |
| `webui/js/bael-supremacy.js`         | Master module orchestration                        |
| `webui/js/bael-master-controller.js` | WebUI initialization                               |
| `webui/index.html`                   | Main entry point (257+ modules loaded)             |

---

## üéÆ COMMON OPERATIONS

### 1. Creating Custom Component

```javascript
// In webui/js/bael-custom-component.js
(function () {
  class BaelCustomComponent {
    constructor() {
      this.state = Alpine.reactive({});
    }

    init() {
      Alpine.data("baelCustomComponent", () => ({
        // component definition
      }));
    }
  }

  window.BaelCustomComponent = new BaelCustomComponent();
  window.BaelCustomComponent.init();
})();
```

### 2. Adding Custom Tool (Python)

```python
# In python/tools/my_tool.py
from python.helpers.tool import Tool, Response

class MyTool(Tool):
    async def execute(self, **kwargs):
        result = await self.process(self.args)
        return Response(message=result, break_loop=False)
```

### 3. Creating Agent Profile

```
/agents/my_agent/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ prompts/
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ agent.system.main.role.md
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ tools/
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ custom_tool.py
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ extensions/
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ agent_init/
‚îÇ       ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ _10_my_extension.py
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ settings.json
```

---

## ‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL PATTERNS

### DO:

- ‚úÖ Use prompts for behavior, not hard-coded logic
- ‚úÖ Return structured `Response` objects from tools
- ‚úÖ Use async/await for all I/O operations
- ‚úÖ Leverage Bael modules for UI functionality
- ‚úÖ Use BaelEventBus for cross-module communication
- ‚úÖ Use BaelState for centralized state management

### DON'T:

- ‚ùå Hard-code behavior in Python code
- ‚ùå Bypass vectorDB for memory operations
- ‚ùå Execute code on host (use Docker container)
- ‚ùå Create duplicate functionality‚Äîcheck existing modules first
- ‚ùå Ignore the exploitation opportunities

---

**Event-Driven**: Full event bus integration
